m=E5n 2008-12-15 klockan 21:36 -0500 skrev David Saff:
> Fredrik,
> 
> I ha=
d forgotten DirectorySuiteBuilder.  In general, I really like having a
> si=
ngle class that describes the tests I want to run--it makes things much
> e=
asier when I want to run things from the command line, or ant, or my
> cont=
inuous build, or...
> 
>    David Saff

Well, this project currently has 12=
 maven modules (plus som packaging
modules) and it's far easier just to hav=
e a naming convention that
everyone sticks to and have the framework do the=
 rest. 
Putting tests into a TestSuite class is considered just administrat=
ion
overhead that adds no value to the project.

I guess we'll have to put =
two DirectorySuiteBuilder classes in each
module that has unit and integrat=
ion tests.

Thanks for your replies.

Still open for suggestions like "you =
could easily fix the eclipse plugin
by looking at the files in org.eclipse.=
....". :)
Perhaps I should go about and file a bug/request report (or vote =
for an
existing one).

/
	Fredrik
